text: “Læa cng raluk khna thi rea di hı phukhea luk nan hiwtaw læa thxn taw khun henux phwk khea prahnung man pen sing thi hı ngea rm kranan læa phwk khea khid wa man ca tklng thab phwk khea phwk cea cng yud xea sing thi rea di hı wi kæ phwk cea dwy khwam khemkhæng læa cng raluk thung sing thi mi xyu nı nan hwang wa phwk cea ca kerng klaw”
